input_query:
You plan to visit 6 European cities for 19 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Riga for 4 days. You would like to visit Athens for 5 days. From day 4 to day 8, there is an annual show you want to attend in Athens. You want to spend 4 days in Valencia. You would like to meet your friends at Valencia between day 1 and day 4 to tour together. You would like to visit Barcelona for 2 days. You plan to stay in Bucharest for 4 days. During day 16 and day 19, you have to attend a conference in Bucharest. You plan to stay in Geneva for 5 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Valencia and Barcelona, Athens and Geneva, Riga and Bucharest, Geneva and Barcelona, Valencia and Geneva, Athens and Bucharest, from Athens to Riga, from Valencia to Athens, Athens and Barcelona, Barcelona and Bucharest, Barcelona and Riga, Valencia and Bucharest.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 19 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
